content.raw: We're trying to version all example programs. Create a directory called `files` in your tutorial and put `model.js` in it. Then, you can use the `<include src='...' />` tag to render the content of the file in the tutorial. Look for `include src` in the tutorials to find examples. Then, you can offer a link for downloading the file instead of pasting the content.
content.html: We're trying to version all example programs. Create a directory called files in your tutorial and put model.js in it. Then, you can use the <include src='...' /> tag to render the content of the file in the tutorial. Look for include src in the tutorials to find examples. Then, you can offer a link for downloading the file instead of pasting the content.
